      <section class="col-sm-9">
        
        <div id="main-content"></div>

                          <h1 class="page-header row ">Graduate Admissions</h1>
                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <section id="block-system-main" class="block block-system clearfix">

      
  <div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-full node-oxdrupal-basic-page node-66551"  >
        <div class="bootstrap-twocol-stacked" >
      <div class="row">
      <div class="panel-panel top col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12"><div class="panel-pane pane-entity-field pane-node-field-region-1"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    
<div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-region-1 paragraphs-items-field-region-1-full paragraphs-items-full">
  
<div class="field field-name-field-region-1 field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71811" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Humanities at Oxford</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>Oxford is at the international forefront of research in the humanities, attracting outstanding students, academics and researchers from across the globe. Our postgraduate students undertake their studies and research in a stimulating, challenging and highly rewarding intellectual environment.</p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
</div>
  </div>

  
  </div>
</div>
    </div>
  
      <div class="row">
      <div class="panel-panel left col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6"><div class="panel-pane pane-entity-field pane-node-field-region-2"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    
<div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-region-2 paragraphs-items-field-region-2-full paragraphs-items-full">
  
<div class="field field-name-field-region-2 field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-67341" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Courses</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>The University of Oxford has four academic divisions, within which are individual departments, faculties or other centres, and a Department for Continuing Education, which offers courses across a range of subjects. For information about courses in Humanities, see:</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses/humanities?wssl=1" target="_blank">List of Humanities courses, with links to details about each course</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses/courses-by-department?wssl=1" target="_blank">List of courses by faculty, with links to details about each course and each faculty </a></li>
</ul></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="panelizer-view-mode paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-full paragraphs-item-related-content paragraphs-item-71736 margin-bottom" id="panelizer-item-71736" >
        <div class="panel-flexible panels-flexible-new clearfix" >
<div class="panel-flexible-inside panels-flexible-new-inside">
<div class="panels-flexible-region panels-flexible-region-new-center panels-flexible-region-first panels-flexible-region-last">
  <div class="inside panels-flexible-region-inside panels-flexible-region-new-center-inside panels-flexible-region-inside-first panels-flexible-region-inside-last">
<div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-related-content-panel-pane-2"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-panel_pane_2 view-dom-id-c4732a7f65f3ee9b402a1f7dbbc1982d">
        
  
  
      <div 
   class="view-content row">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 first-in-row last-in-row views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 items-per-row-1 thumbnail-row">
    <a href="/faculties-and-units">
  <article about="/faculties-and-units" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-oxdrupal-basic-page node--oxdrupal_basic_page--thumbnail_row listing-style-thumbnail-row">
                <img typeof="foaf:Image" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/thumbnail_row_image/public/humanities/images/media/72.dpi_.jpg?itok=oxuEJ0pv" width="100" height="100" alt="History Faculty Building" />
    
        <div class="thumbnail-panel-title">
            <h3>Faculties and units</h3>
        </div>
                                    
    <div class="clearfix"></div>
  </article>
  <div class="listing-spacer thumbnail-row-spacer"></div>
</a>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>  </div>

  
  </div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div></div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71741" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>How do I apply?</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>Enquiries about applying to Oxford for graduate study should be directed to the University’s <a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/contact_details.html#apostgraduate_admissions" target="_blank"><u>Graduate Admissions Office</u></a>.</p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71746" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Deadlines for applications</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>Application <em>deadlines</em> for each postgraduate course at Oxford are listed on the relevant course pages on the University’s Graduate Admissions website. Some courses accept applications under more than one <em>deadline</em>, but if you wish to be considered for scholarship funding you must make sure you apply by the relevant January <em>deadline</em>. If more than one application <em>deadline</em> is listed for your chosen graduate course, this means that the department to which you are applying considers applications in two or more separate batches.</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses/humanities?wssl=1" target="_blank">List of courses, with links to the course pages</a></li>
</ul></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
</div>
  </div>

  
  </div>
</div>
      <div class="panel-panel right col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6"><div class="panel-pane pane-entity-field pane-node-field-region-3"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    
<div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-region-3 paragraphs-items-field-region-3-full paragraphs-items-full">
  
<div class="field field-name-field-region-3 field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71751" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>How much does it cost?</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>The University website provides information and advice to prospective postgraduate students about tuition and college fees, fee status and fee liability, other specific costs related to some courses of study, such as field trips and consumables, and living costs in Oxford.</p>
<ul><li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding" target="_blank">Fees and funding</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/tuition-and-college-fees" target="_blank">Tuition and college fees</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search" target="_blank">Fees, funding and scholarship search</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses" target="_blank">Additional course costs – check the pages for the course in which you are interested</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/tuition-and-college-fees/fee-status?wssl=1" target="_blank">Fee status (e.g. do you have to pay fees at home (UK) levels or overseas levels?</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/tuition-and-college-fees/fee-liability?wssl=1" target="_blank">Fee liability (i.e. for what period of time will you have to pay tuition fee to the University?)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/living-costs?wssl=1" target="_blank">Living costs</a></li>
</ul></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71756" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>What funding is available?</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>There is a range of funding sources for postgraduate students, including scholarships and loans. Further information:</p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="panelizer-view-mode paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-full paragraphs-item-related-content paragraphs-item-71761 margin-bottom" id="panelizer-item-71761" >
        <div class="panel-flexible panels-flexible-new clearfix" >
<div class="panel-flexible-inside panels-flexible-new-inside">
<div class="panels-flexible-region panels-flexible-region-new-center panels-flexible-region-first panels-flexible-region-last">
  <div class="inside panels-flexible-region-inside panels-flexible-region-new-center-inside panels-flexible-region-inside-first panels-flexible-region-inside-last">
<div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-related-content-panel-pane-2"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-panel_pane_2 view-dom-id-2459f845bff3fa0d687147534a9bbfcc">
        
  
  
      <div 
   class="view-content row">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 first-in-row last-in-row views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 items-per-row-1 thumbnail-row">
    <a href="/graduate-funding">
  <article about="/graduate-funding" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-oxdrupal-basic-page node--oxdrupal_basic_page--thumbnail_row listing-style-thumbnail-row">
                <img typeof="foaf:Image" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/thumbnail_row_image/public/humanities/images/media/background-20126_1920.jpg?itok=r1lQfi1d" width="100" height="100" alt="Piles of coins" />
    
        <div class="thumbnail-panel-title">
            <h3>Graduate funding</h3>
        </div>
                                    
    <div class="clearfix"></div>
  </article>
  <div class="listing-spacer thumbnail-row-spacer"></div>
</a>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>  </div>

  
  </div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div></div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71766" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p> </p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 700;">University website:</span></p>
<ul><li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/graduate-scholarships" target="_blank">Graduate Scholarships</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/other-funding-sources?wssl=1" style="outline: 0px; color: rgb(35, 82, 124); text-decoration: underline;" target="_blank">Other funding sources</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search" target="_blank">Fees, funding and scholarship search</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/loans" target="_blank">Loans</a></li>
</ul></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
</div>
  </div>

  
  </div>
</div>
    </div>
  
      <div class="row">
      <div class="panel-panel bottom col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12"><div class="panel-pane pane-entity-field pane-node-field-region-4"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    
<div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-region-4 paragraphs-items-field-region-4-full paragraphs-items-full">
  
<div class="field field-name-field-region-4 field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71771" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Teaching and supervision</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>As a graduate student at Oxford you will belong to an academic department or faculty which will provide your teaching and supervision, and provide numerous resources to support your studies. Information about the research interests of our academics is available on faculty pages. Links to faculty websites are available here:</p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="panelizer-view-mode paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-full paragraphs-item-related-content paragraphs-item-71776 margin-bottom" id="panelizer-item-71776" >
        <div class="panel-flexible panels-flexible-new clearfix" >
<div class="panel-flexible-inside panels-flexible-new-inside">
<div class="panels-flexible-region panels-flexible-region-new-center panels-flexible-region-first panels-flexible-region-last">
  <div class="inside panels-flexible-region-inside panels-flexible-region-new-center-inside panels-flexible-region-inside-first panels-flexible-region-inside-last">
<div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-related-content-related-content-list"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-related_content_list view-dom-id-2dfbd4f6eaee376853c97e99e6a0e3d9">
        
  
  
      <div 
   class="view-content row">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 first-in-row views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4 items-per-row-3 list">
    <a href="/faculties-and-units">
  <article about="/faculties-and-units" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-oxdrupal-basic-page node--oxdrupal_basic_page--list listing-list-style">
    <div class="list-style-wrapper">
                <div class="list-style-text-wrapper">
          <div class="list-style-title">
            <h3>Faculties and units</h3>
          </div>

                                          <div class="list-style-arrow fa fa-chevron-circle-right"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    <div class="clearfix"></div>
  </article>
  <div class="listing-spacer list-spacer"></div>
</a>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>  </div>

  
  </div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div></div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71781" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Researcher Development</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>A range of skills and competencies are necessary for the successful completion of a programme of graduate study, and to prepare you for an academic or other career. The Humanities Division offers a range of training and development activities each year, primarily for doctoral students and postdocs. For further information, see the Researcher Development section on the Humanities website.</p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="panelizer-view-mode paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-full paragraphs-item-related-content paragraphs-item-71786 margin-bottom" id="panelizer-item-71786" >
        <div class="panel-flexible panels-flexible-new clearfix" >
<div class="panel-flexible-inside panels-flexible-new-inside">
<div class="panels-flexible-region panels-flexible-region-new-center panels-flexible-region-first panels-flexible-region-last">
  <div class="inside panels-flexible-region-inside panels-flexible-region-new-center-inside panels-flexible-region-inside-first panels-flexible-region-inside-last">
<div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-related-content-panel-pane-2"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-panel_pane_2 view-dom-id-e1ff135f3523f7f7d2af6fa4e5ecab1e">
        
  
  
      <div 
   class="view-content row">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 first-in-row last-in-row views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 items-per-row-1 thumbnail-row">
    <a href="/researcher-development">
  <article about="/researcher-development" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-oxdrupal-basic-page node--oxdrupal_basic_page--thumbnail_row listing-style-thumbnail-row">
                <img typeof="foaf:Image" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/thumbnail_row_image/public/humanities/images/media/cubes-677092_1280.png?itok=dOdxwsLK" width="100" height="100" alt="The building blocks of researcher development" />
    
        <div class="thumbnail-panel-title">
            <h3>Researcher Development</h3>
        </div>
                                    
    <div class="clearfix"></div>
  </article>
  <div class="listing-spacer thumbnail-row-spacer"></div>
</a>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>  </div>

  
  </div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div></div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71791" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Colleges</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>All postgraduate students are members of both a faculty or the Ruskin School of Art, and a college or hall. Colleges and halls provide a range of support and facilities to students, including residential accommodation, particularly for new students. Further information is available on the University’s website:</p>
<ul><li><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/colleges" target="_blank">Colleges</a></li>
</ul></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
</div>
  </div>

  
  </div>
</div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
</section>
  </div>
      </section>

      <section class="col-sm-9">
        
        <div id="main-content"></div>

                          <h1 class="page-header row ">Graduate funding</h1>
                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <section id="block-system-main" class="block block-system clearfix">

      
  <div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-full node-oxdrupal-basic-page node-62406"  >
        <div class="bootstrap-twocol-stacked" >
      <div class="row">
      <div class="panel-panel top col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12"><div class="panel-pane pane-entity-field pane-node-field-region-1"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    
<div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-region-1 paragraphs-items-field-region-1-full paragraphs-items-full">
  
<div class="field field-name-field-region-1 field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-67381" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p>Scholarships covering fees, living expenses, or fees plus living expenses, are available to outstanding graduate applicants subject to eligibility.</p>
<p><strong>Deadline:</strong></p>
<p>To be considered for funding, candidates applying to start a course from October 2017 must have submitted their University application(s) for the course(s) for which they wish to be considered by the relevant January deadline in 2017.</p>
<p><strong>How to apply:</strong></p>
<p>Candidates <strong>applying for admission to a graduate course by the January deadline</strong> will automatically be considered for their eligibility for funding from a number of sources including:</p>
<ul><li>the AHRC</li>
<li>the Clarendon Fund</li>
<li>Oxford Colleges</li>
<li>Benefactors and Trust Funds</li>
</ul><p>Candidates wishing to be considered for an Ertegun Graduate Scholarship must:</p>
<ul><li>indicate that they wish to be considered for this scholarship on their University course application form, and</li>
<li>submit a supporting statement.</li>
</ul><h2>Sources of funding </h2>
<p>The University, Division, Faculties and Colleges all have sources of funding available to graduate students. Major funding schemes include:  </p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="panelizer-view-mode paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-full paragraphs-item-related-content paragraphs-item-102331 margin-bottom" id="panelizer-item-102331" >
        <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" >
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-related-content-panel-pane-3"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-panel_pane_3 view-dom-id-3aeea58f5cddabe20f3fe2637aacc5fd">
        
  
  
      <div 
   class="view-content row">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 first-in-row views-row-odd views-row-first col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 items-per-row-2 callout">
    <a href="/ahrc-dtp" class="callout-link">
  <article about="/ahrc-dtp" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-oxdrupal-basic-page node--oxdrupal_basic_page--callout listing-style-callout type-oxdrupal_basic_page">
    
        
        <div class="listing-detail">
          <div class="listing-title">
              <h3>AHRC DTP</h3>
          </div>
                        <div class="teaser-field text-wrapper">
                              </div>
                                              </div>
    <div class="clearfix"></div>
  </article>
  <div class="listing-spacer callout-spacer"></div>
</a>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 last-in-row views-row-even views-row-last col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 items-per-row-2 callout">
    <a href="/ahrc-dtp-studentship-faqs" class="callout-link">
  <article about="/ahrc-dtp-studentship-faqs" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-oxdrupal-basic-page node--oxdrupal_basic_page--callout listing-style-callout type-oxdrupal_basic_page">
    
        
        <div class="listing-detail">
          <div class="listing-title">
              <h3>AHRC DTP studentship FAQs</h3>
          </div>
                        <div class="teaser-field text-wrapper">
                              </div>
                                              </div>
    <div class="clearfix"></div>
  </article>
  <div class="listing-spacer callout-spacer"></div>
</a>  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>  </div>

  
  </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div></div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-advanced-accordion margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-66081" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-advanced-accordion-section field-type-field-collection field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="view view-field-collection-advanced-accordion-view view-id-field_collection_advanced_accordion_view view-display-id-default view-dom-id-bfbf2737b646d984b98db69db43f8c23">
        
  
  
      <div 
   >
      <div id="views-bootstrap-accordion-1" class="views-bootstrap-accordion-plugin-style panel-group">
        <div class="panel panel-default">
      <div class="panel-heading">
        <h4 class="panel-title">
          <a class="accordion-toggle collapsed"
             data-toggle="collapse"
             data-parent="#collapse1-0"
             href="#collapse1-0"
             name="collapse1-0"
             target="_self">
            Clarendon Scholarships.          </a>
        </h4>
      </div>

      <div id="collapse1-0" class="panel-collapse collapse">
        <div class="panel-body">
            
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-advanced-section-content">        <div class="field-content"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71311" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p> </p>
<p><a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/clarendon/information-for-applicants" target="_blank">http://www.ox.ac.uk/clarendon/information-for-applicants</a></p>
<p>If you apply for a full- or part-time master's or DPhil course at Oxford by the January deadline for your course, you will <strong>automatically</strong> be considered for a Clarendon Scholarship.</p>
<p>Applications for entry in 2017-18 can be submitted from 1 September 2016. If you wish to be considered for Clarendon, you must apply before the January deadline for your course. You can find the deadlines for your chosen course on the relevant <a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses" target="_blank">Course</a> page.</p>
<p> </p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>  </div>        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
      <div class="panel panel-default">
      <div class="panel-heading">
        <h4 class="panel-title">
          <a class="accordion-toggle collapsed"
             data-toggle="collapse"
             data-parent="#collapse1-1"
             href="#collapse1-1"
             name="collapse1-1"
             target="_self">
            Ertegun Postgraduate Scholarships in the Humanities          </a>
        </h4>
      </div>

      <div id="collapse1-1" class="panel-collapse collapse">
        <div class="panel-body">
            
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-advanced-section-content">        <div class="field-content"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71316" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p> </p>
<p>To be considered for an Ertegun Graduate Scholarship candidates need to submit a supporting statement in addition to indicating that they wish to be considered for this particular scholarship on their University application. </p>
<p>The Ertegun Graduate Scholarship Programme in the Humanities was established in 2012. The programme makes available a number of scholarships each year. Candidates apply for scholarships at the same time as they apply for a graduate course at Oxford.</p>
<p><strong>For further information, see <a href="http://www.ertegun.ox.ac.uk/scholarships" target="_blank">http://www.ertegun.ox.ac.uk/scholarships</a></strong></p>
<p> </p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>  </div>        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
      <div class="panel panel-default">
      <div class="panel-heading">
        <h4 class="panel-title">
          <a class="accordion-toggle collapsed"
             data-toggle="collapse"
             data-parent="#collapse1-2"
             href="#collapse1-2"
             name="collapse1-2"
             target="_self">
            AHRC/CEELBAS Centre for Doctoral Training          </a>
        </h4>
      </div>

      <div id="collapse1-2" class="panel-collapse collapse">
        <div class="panel-body">
            
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-advanced-section-content">        <div class="field-content"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71321" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p> </p>
<p> </p>
<p>The Centre for Doctoral Training (CDT) in Russian, Slavonic and East European languages and culture is a consortium of the University of Oxford, University College London (UCL) and the universities of Cambridge and Manchester, funded by the Arts and Humanities Research Council (AHRC).</p>
<p><strong>For more information, including how to apply for studentships, see <a href="http://www.ceelbas.ac.uk/cdt/students" target="_blank">http://www.ceelbas.ac.uk/cdt/students</a>.</strong></p>
<p>The Centre for East European Language-Based Area Studies (CEELBAS) is a major collaboration between the universities of Bath, Birmingham, Cambridge, Kent, Manchester, Oxford, Sheffield, Warwick, the School of Oriental and African Studies at the University of London, and UCL. The main objectives of the Centre are to realise the UK's strategic commitment to the study of Central and Eastern Europe and Russia, to help set the research agenda for the study of the region and to inform policy, nationally and internationally.</p>
<p><strong>For further information, see <a href="http://www.ceelbas.ac.uk/" target="_blank">http://www.ceelbas.ac.uk/</a>. </strong></p>
<p> </p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>  </div>        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
      <div class="panel panel-default">
      <div class="panel-heading">
        <h4 class="panel-title">
          <a class="accordion-toggle collapsed"
             data-toggle="collapse"
             data-parent="#collapse1-3"
             href="#collapse1-3"
             name="collapse1-3"
             target="_self">
            Weidenfeld-Hoffman Scholarships and Leadership Programme          </a>
        </h4>
      </div>

      <div id="collapse1-3" class="panel-collapse collapse">
        <div class="panel-body">
            
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-advanced-section-content">        <div class="field-content"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71326" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><p> </p>
<p>The Weidenfeld-Hoffmann Scholarships and Leadership Programme cultivates the leaders of tomorrow by providing outstanding university graduates and professionals from developing and emerging economies with the opportunity to pursue fully-funded graduate studies at the University of Oxford, combined with a comprehensive programme of leadership development, long-term mentoring and networking.</p>
<p><strong>For further information, see <a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search/weidenfeld-hoffmann-scholarships-and-leadership-programme" target="_blank">http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search/weidenfeld-hoffmann-scholarships-and-leadership-programme</a></strong></p>
<p> </p>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>  </div>        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
                        <div class="field-item private-show odd"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-71331" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
          <h2>Further Information</h2>
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><ul><li>Course lists and how to apply for courses and funding: <a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate" target="_blank">http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate</a></li>
<li>Fees and funding information on the University website: <a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/" target="_blank">http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/</a></li>
<li>Fees, Funding and Scholarships Search: <a href="http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search" target="_blank">http://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search</a></li>
</ul><p>Please contact the Graduate Admissions and Funding Office if you have questions about applying to Oxford for graduate study:</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://uni-of-oxford.custhelp.com/app/home/p/26/" target="_blank">https://uni-of-oxford.custhelp.com/app/home/p/26/</a></li>
</ul></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>

   class="view-content row">

      <section class="col-sm-9">
        
        <div id="main-content"></div>

                          <h1 class="page-header row ">Graduate Research Showcase</h1>
                                                          <div class="region region-content">
    <section id="block-system-main" class="block block-system clearfix">

      
  <div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-full node-oxdrupal-basic-page node-104281"  >
        <div class="bootstrap-twocol-stacked" >
  
      <div class="row">
      <div class="panel-panel left col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="panel-pane pane-entity-field pane-node-field-region-2"  >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    
<div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-region-2 paragraphs-items-field-region-2-full paragraphs-items-full">
  
<div class="field field-name-field-region-2 field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><div class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-wysiwyg-content-area margin-bottom widget-width-12-columns paragraphs-item-75351" about="" typeof="">
    <div class="content">
        
<div class="field field-name-field-content field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden">
    <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item private-show even"><table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width:100%;"><tbody><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
            <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/butler_k.jpg?itok=pjRUowxx" alt="Katherine Butler, Poster on Digitally Reconstructing Tudor Music Manuscripts" /></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of Music</h4>
<p><strong>Digitally Reconstructing Tudor Music Manuscripts: John Sadler's Partbooks</strong></p>
<p><em><strong>Katherine Butler</strong></em></p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 10px;">When the Elizabethan gentleman John Sadler sat down to copy his collection of latin sacred songs in c.1566-85, little did he know that he had chosen an overly acidic ink.... <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/pages_from_torch_posters_2016.pdf" target="_blank">Read More</a></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
            <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/robertson.jpg?itok=gJuIH622" alt="Olivia Robertson: Out of sight and over here" /></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of History</h4>
<p><strong>Out of Sight and Over Here: Foreign female domestic servants in London 1880-1939 </strong></p>
<p><em><strong>Olivia Robertson</strong></em></p>
<p>There were c.12,000 foreign-born female domestic servants in the 1911 population census, with just under half living in London.... <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/olivia_robertson.pdf" target="_blank">Read More</a></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
            <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/little_a.jpg?itok=kK-1lLNB" alt="Alice Little: The Tunebooks of JB Malchair" /></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of Music</h4>
<p><strong>The tunebooks of JB Malchair: Oxford c.1770-1812</strong></p>
<p><strong> <em>Alice Little</em></strong></p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 10px;">From the 1770s until his death in 1812 JB Malchair, a musician and artist living in Oxford, collected traditional tunes of various nations.... <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/little_alice.pdf" target="_blank">Read more</a></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
            <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/chadwick.jpg?itok=rhRwazI7" alt="Philip Chadwick: Strange Bedfellows" /></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of Medieval and Modern Languages</h4>
<p><strong>Strange Bedfellows?: The Presentation of the Provincial Town in Fyodor Dostoevsky &amp; George Eliot</strong></p>
<p><strong> <em>Philip Chadwick</em></strong></p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 10px;">To date, no monograph exisits that compates the works of George Eliot (1819-1880) and Fyodor Dostoevsky (1821-1881).... <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/philip_chadwick.pdf" target="_blank">Read more</a></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
        <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/martin_christ.pdf">    <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/christ.jpg?itok=JKhk3zo_" alt="Martin Christ: the Reformation in upper Lusatia" /></a></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of History</h4>
<p><strong>The Reformation in Upper Lusatia: Pragmatism and Tolderation, c.1520-1635</strong></p>
<p><em><strong>Martin Christ</strong></em></p>
<p>The Reformation is widely seen as one of the central events of the sixteenth century. In many cases it led to violence and religious conflict. Not in Upper Lusatia...<a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/martin_christ.pdf" target="_blank">Read more</a></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
        <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/lucy_dunlop.pdf">    <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/dunlop.jpg?itok=RlqscpLY" alt="Lucy Dunlop: Leisure soon gets boring" /></a></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of Medieval and Modern Languages</h4>
<p><strong>Leisure Soon Gets Boring: Organised Activities for Late-Soviet Youth</strong></p>
<p><em><strong>Lucy Dunlop</strong></em></p>
<p>In 1966, an article in the Societ journal <em>Young Communist</em> described the dangers of 'wild tourism'....<a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/lucy_dunlop.pdf" target="_blank">Read more</a></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>
<div class="file file-image file-image-jpeg embed-image small align-center">
        <a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/cailah_jackson.pdf">    <img src="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/mt_image_small/public/humanities/images/media/jackson.jpg?itok=rDNmwjwU" alt="Jackson:Patrons and Artists at the Crossroads" /></a></div>
</td>
<td>
<h4>Faculty of Oriental Studies</h4>
<p><strong>Patrons &amp; Artists at the Crossroads: The Islamic Arts of the Book in the Lands of Rūm, 1270s-1370s</strong></p>
<p><em><strong>Cailah Jackson</strong></em></p>
<p>This thesis is about the production and patronage of Islamic illuminated manuscripts produced in central and eastern Anatolia (known in Arabic as ‘Bilād al-Rūm’) between the 1270s and 1370s...<a href="http://www.humanities.ox.ac.uk/sites/default/files/humanities/documents/media/cailah_jackson.pdf" target="_blank"> Read more </a></p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table></div>
            </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
            </div>
</div>
</div>
  </div>

  
  </div>
</div>
          </div>
  
  </div>
</div>
</section>
  </div>
      </section>

            
    </div>

    <!-- REGION POSTSCRIPT -->
    <div id="postscript">
                    </div><!-- END REGION POSTSCRIPT -->
  </div><!-- end content container -->
</div>
